title: paNNina puNNiyam
sahitya:
rAgA:  kalyANi   
  paNNiNa puNNiyam yAdammA adaip-parindu emakkingu kUrammA


anupallavi

  pArkkaDal pAmbaNai viDuttup-paramanun maDiyeDuttup-pAluNNa yashOdA nI
			rAg  kIravANi


caraNam 1    kaTTit-tayir vaNNai kAiccina pAl vaittu kAttirundEn edir pArttirundEn
 taTTi vazhi maraittu um caTTit-tayir vaNNai koTTiyavan uNNa gOkulattIr nIvir
    caraNam 2  			rAgA:  nATakuranjiAa:S R2 G3 M1 N2 D2 N2 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 M1 G3 M1 P M1 G3 R2 S  eNNam enum izhaiyil paNmalargaL toDuttu kaNNan kazhal shAttak-kAttirundEn
 paNNishait-tummuDan pAl nilavil avan vaNNamAi viLaiyADa vanitaiyIr nIvir
    caraNam 3  			rAga:  lalitAAa:S R1 G3 M1 D1 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D1 M1 G3 R1 S  tanjam tanjamenru tAL malar paNindum konjamum enniDam dayavillA gOvindan
 anjEl anjElenru anru giri tAngi anbuDan aDaikkalam tandiDa Ayarkulam
